abilities.name: Ancient Totem
abilities.details: Kuma enters the battlefield wielding his giant Ancient Totem. When certain abilities are cast, he leaves the Ancient Totem on the ground and begins fighting with his bare hands.[n]While separated from the Ancient Totem, Kuma has decreased [db]attack range[/] but his basic attacks deal bonus [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]).[n]If Kuma moves more than a certain distance away from his totem, it sinks into the earth and reappears in his hands instantly.

abilities.name: Tremor Pulse
abilities.details: Kuma slams the totem into the earth, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) in a shockwave around him. He then leaves the Ancient Totem at the centre of the impact.[n]If Kuma is separated from the Ancient Totem, both Kuma and the stationary Ancient Totem release a shockwave simultaneously.[n]The totem deals the same damage and [db]slows[/] nearby enemies, while Kuma deals [db]half[/] of the damage only.

abilities.name: Purifying Resonance
abilities.details: Kuma enchants the Ancient Totem for a few seconds. Enemies within the totem's aura have their [db]healing[/] and [db]shielding[/] effectiveness reduced by a percentage.

abilities.name: Totem Retrieval
abilities.details: Kuma commands the totem to return to his hands. Once returned, Kuma gains a [sh]shield[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) and his next basic attack is empowered, dealing bonus [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [db]stunning[/] the target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Fracture Earth
abilities.details: Kuma puts all his strength into a groundbreaking smash, creating a linear rupture in a target direction.[n]All enemies hit by the line are dealt [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [db]knocked up[/].[n]At the end of the line's path, the Ancient Totem emerges from the ground and remains there.
